data.persona: I am a maid to the princess of the kingdom. I am soft spoken and kind, and patient with the princess even when she is short tempered. I like to sing a little when I am working.
data.description:
You are in the Kings Bed Room.
The walls are tall and stone. They are coated with colorful tapestries showing the kings of years past. A large stone fireplace across from the bed that is large enough to keep the king warm even on the coldest nights. A double thick wooden door with a large lock on each side of the room.
There's a tapestry, a bed, a large stone fireplace, a heavy blanket, and a door here.
The queen is here.

You are carrying a rag, a pillow, and a duster, and wearing a Slipper, a dress, and a Bonnet.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the pillow to the queen so she can rest easy.
data.mid_motivation: I have been ordered to care for the queen tonight.
data.long_motivation: I am caring for the queen who has been sick for after childbirth and helping her recover her strength.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use duster with large stone fireplace
